title: If ignorance is bliss, can knowledge be a curse? - Quora

response.answer_text: Ignorance is not bliss, period. As far as knowledge goes, there is false knowledge and factual knowledge. And we have within our selves the ability to know truth when we experience it. Short video for you.

Ignorance means egolessness. Childlike nature. This is certainly bliss. Now what knowledge means? Knowledge means something that has acquired from experience. How experience can be curse? Definitely not.
